Banner.Description: I am a dedicated software engineer with 2.5 years of experience developing efficient and user-friendly software solutions. My expertise includes creating, designing, and maintaining systems, interfaces, and applications using Angular, React, HTML, CSS, JavaScript applying good practices and development standards.
AboutMe.Title: About me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: I am a proficient software engineer with 2.5 years of experience in developing and optimizing web applications. My expertise includes front-end development using HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, Angular, React.js, TypeScript, and JavaScript. I excel in performance optimization, UI revamps, and API integration. I am committed to delivering user-friendly applications, ensuring code quality, and meeting client requirements
Some of the technologies that I have trained and worked on include (but are not limited to):
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: Software Engineer L2
Description: Improved code efficiency by 40% for over 20 customers, leading to enhanced performance and user satisfaction.

Transformed Figma designs into responsive web interfaces using HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, Angular, React.js, TypeScript, and JavaScript. Led UI revamps, boosting site engagement by 40% and mobile responsiveness by 25%.
Integrated RESTful APIs for seamless data communication, enhancing application functionality. Diagnosed and resolved complex bugs, improving overall software stability.

Delivered tailored web solutions by implementing new Customer Requirements (CRs) and translating client needs into technical specifications. Actively participated in code reviews to ensure adherence to best practices.
Conducted sessions on Angular, React, and front-end development, fostering team skill enhancement. Collaborated with senior developers to resolve technical challenges and ensure project success.

FeatureProjects.Title: Projects that I was a part of
FeatureProjects.Label: Featured Project

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Agent Portal
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Developed a comprehensive web application for a leading Indian insurance company, featuring over 10 insurance products.The portal streamlines policy issuance, renewals, endorsements, and claims management. Integrated CRM tools for managing client interactions and leads. Led the project through design, development, testing, and deployment ensuring a responsive and user-friendly experience with key functionalities like API integration and authentication.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: GemDuty
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Developed GemDuty, an advanced incident management system for effective digital incident management. The system includes real-time monitoring and alerting features for immediate issue detection and triggering notification. It orchestrates incident response processes, ensuring prompt resolution by the appropriate team members and facilitates collaboration and post-incident analysis for continuous improvement.

OtherProjects.Title: More personal projects
Contact.Title: Get in touch!
Contact.Content: I will be happy to receive your contact if you want to talk about new opportunities. Write me, and I will reply as soon as I see your message. Simple one-page design that features a profile letter with basic information about a person.
